short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture a web page in PDF format to upload to the LendingPad Loan Origination System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for current LendingPad LOS users, this extension captures texts on a web page in PDF format and send the PDF file to the LendingPad Loan Origination System directly.  

Processors or underwriters could use this extension to document items needed for a loan file from a website.  This extension removes multiple steps and the need for using a PDF tool, manually save files locally, then upload.  This extension saves texts, not graphics from a website.
